languages.text: {n}Увидев ваш расклад, все за столом начинают восхищенно гудеть. Но затем они начинают восторженно орать — на руках у Джай оказывается самый дорогой расклад в игре.{/n}
{n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увидев ваш расклад, все за столом начинают восхищенно гудеть. Но затем они начинают восторженно орать — на руках у Джай оказывается самый дорогой расклад в игре.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}
{n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}
{n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}
{n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你开牌时，桌边的每个人都兴奋不已。但随后，叽叽喳喳的声音变成了胜利的咆哮声——婕伊的牌才是最大的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你开牌时，桌边的每个人都兴奋不已。但随后，叽叽喳喳的声音变成了胜利的咆哮声——婕伊的牌才是最大的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの手札を見て、テーブルの全員が興奮に包まれる。しかし、そのおしゃべりは勝利の歓声に変わる…ジェイの手が、このゲーム最強の手なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの手札を見て、テーブルの全員が興奮に包まれる。しかし、そのおしゃべりは勝利の歓声に変わる…ジェイの手が、このゲーム最強の手なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al ver tu mano, la mesa es un batiburrillo de emociones, pero la charla da paso a un rugido triunfal. La mano de Jae es la más valiosa del juego.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al ver tu mano, la mesa es un batiburrillo de emociones, pero la charla da paso a un rugido triunfal. La mano de Jae es la más valiosa del juego.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout le monde autour de la table s'enthousiasme à la vue de votre main, mais leurs exclamations se changent soudain en cri triomphal : la main de Jae est la meilleure qu'il soit possible d'obtenir dans ce jeu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout le monde autour de la table s'enthousiasme à la vue de votre main, mais leurs exclamations se changent soudain en cri triomphal : la main de Jae est la meilleure qu'il soit possible d'obtenir dans ce jeu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rest am Tisch sieht deine Hand und verfällt in hektische Aufregung. Doch dann wandelt sich der Aufruhr zu einem Gebrüll des Triumphs – Jae hat die wertvollste Hand der Partie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rest am Tisch sieht deine Hand und verfällt in hektische Aufregung. Doch dann wandelt sich der Aufruhr zu einem Gebrüll des Triumphs – Jae hat die wertvollste Hand der Partie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elinin görüntüsü, masadaki herkeste bir heyecan dalgası yaratıyor. Ardından bu mırıltılar, zafer dolu haykırışlara dönüşüyor. Jae'ın eli, oyundaki en değerli el.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your hand sets everyone at the table into a flurry of excitement. But then the chatter turns into a roar of triumph — Jae's hand is the most valuable in the game.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elinin görüntüsü, masadaki herkeste bir heyecan dalgası yaratıyor ama ardından bu mırıltılar zafer dolu haykırışlara dönüşüyor. Jae'ın eli, oyundaki en değerli el.{/n}
